name: remotion-captions
description: Remotion project for generating Slovak captions in videos

scripts.subtitles:sk: cd scripts/whisper-project && uv run main.py --preview Guitar.mp4 -o subtitles_sk.srt
scripts.subtitles:en: cd scripts/whisper-project && uv run main.py --language en --preview Guitar.mp4 -o subtitles_en.srt
scripts.subtitles:sk-en: cd scripts/whisper-project && uv run main.py Guitar.mp4 --translate --preview -o subtitles_sk-en.srt
scripts.subtitles:preview: cd scripts/whisper-project && uv run main.py Guitar.mp4 --preview
scripts.lint:python: cd scripts/whisper-project && uv run ruff check whisper_subtitles/
scripts.lint:python:fix: cd scripts/whisper-project && uv run ruff check --fix whisper_subtitles/
